command.name: payment.new
command.doc: This method creates or updates the payment options for this event. Only the fields passed as arguments will be modified. It returns the list of active methods of payment. Payment methods can only be updated before your event goes live.

param.name: event_id
param.doc: The event ID.

param.name: accept_paypal
param.doc: Accept PayPal payments (1 or 0).

param.name: paypal_email
param.doc: Your PayPal email. Defaults to the user email address if not provided.

param.name: accept_google
param.doc: Accept Google Checkout payments (1 or 0).

param.name: google_merchant_id
param.doc: Google Checkout Merchant ID. Required if accept_google is 1.

param.name: google_merchant_key
param.doc: Google Checkout Merchant Key. Required if accept_google is 1.

param.name: accept_check
param.doc: Accept 'Pay by Check' payments (1 or 0).

param.name: instructions_check
param.doc: Instructions to attendees who want to pay by check.

param.name: accept_cash
param.doc: Accept 'Pay with Cash' payments (1 or 0).

param.name: instructions_cash
param.doc: Instructions to attendees who want to pay with cash.

param.name: accept_invoice
param.doc: Accept 'Send an Invoice' payments (1 or 0).

param.name: instructions_invoice
param.doc: Instructions to attendees who need to be sent an invoice.
